summary: A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their captures, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.
cast: Max von Sydow|Ingrid Thulin|Gunnar Björnstrand|Naima Wifstrand|Bengt Ekerot|Bibi Andersson|Gertrud Fridh|Lars Ekborg|Toivo Pawlo|Erland Josephson|Åke Fridell|Sif Ruud|Oscar Ljung|Ulla Sjöblom|Axel Düberg|Birgitta Pettersson|Frithiof Bjärne|Tor Borong|Arne Martensson|Harry Schein
title: El rostro
